did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Photographs of gun-shot injuries #4718. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Photo album showing Union Army Civil War soldiers' gunshot wounds. Printed matter identifying the soldier pictured and describing the context and outcome of his case is mounted on the verso of each photograph.
No title page; author, title and imprint from spine.

Regiment: Co E 2nd NYHA
